basics.name: Nelson Liang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2022.

courses: ICS 111 Introduction to Computer Science I
ICS 211 Introduction to Computer Science II
ICS 141 Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science I
ICS 241 Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science II

work.summary: Install, troubleshoot and maintain hardware, software, networking, and peripherals for computers running in university's library.
highlights: Assist in installing networking and other data cables, computer equipment and peripherals, and troubleshooting network environment consisting of hubs, switches, & servers using different network tools.
Assist in inventory and record keeping of all department computers and related equipment.
Assist in moving equipment and reinstalling units to operating standard.
Assist in management of department network and servers.

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
